response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present an exclusive opportunity for you to acquire our flagship product. This innovative solution is not just a product; it's a game-changer in its field, designed to revolutionize the way you operate and enhance your business significantly. Given its unparalleled capabilities and the impact it can have on your endeavors, we believe its true value exceeds $1,000,000.

We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an exceptional deal considering the immense benefits it promises. We understand that every business decision is unique and requires careful consideration, which is why we are providing you with ample time to evaluate its potential impact on your operations.

Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer. We are confident that once you experience the capabilities of this product, you will see its true worth far surpassing the offered price.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
